entries.quest_destroy_d: Destroy Ace Black Sun Hunters or Ace Black Sun Bloodstalkers.
entries.quest_destroy_t: Thick of Battle: Black Sun Fighters
entries.quest_location_d: 'The Empire has completed their move just beyond the the safe-haven of Ord Mantell, setting up a Naval staging area. Imperial warships, moving through training maneuvers, are a common in Ord Mantell's once-quiet system. However, the Empire isn't looking for trouble from the inhabitants of the smuggler planet.'
entries.split_quest_alert: Dartas Pytin: <Pilot! Black Sun spies are sending out the Black Envy virus to our fleet! Destroy them quickly!>
entries.title: The Hunt: Blacksun Fighters
entries.title_d: 'Our fight with the Black Sun is almost at an end. Finally, we'll be able to launch our final attack. I am glad to be a part of it!'
